metadata.title: I want to evaluate a different motor of larger power and/or higher voltage. Is that possible?

sections.content:
Question:
I want to evaluate a different motor of larger power and/or higher voltage. Is that possible?
Answer:
Yes. The kit has an expansion connector (not populated) which allows expanding it with either a higher power interface board, or high voltage interface board, available from our partner. Please contact our development partner for more information.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
